subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers’ Carl Hagelin is second on the team in playoff points and first in plus-minus rating. But Coach John Tortorella said he has kept him out of power plays because of mistakes.
snippet: The Rangers’ Carl Hagelin is second on the team in playoff points and first in plus-minus rating. But Coach John Tortorella said he has kept him out of power plays because of mistakes.
